name: Dice Fights
description:
Frick, I've made a mistake in the title in game

Tell me if there are any bugs, because I was too tired to test the game.

Okay I found some bugs:

- Dealing negative damage doesn' works

-Third lever doesn't work so player can't enjoy the 75% of the game. 

I am pro at game developing, I know

When GMTK Game Jam 2022 will end I will fix that, but it won't matter.

Controls:

WSAD or ARROWS - move

ESC - back to main menu

I think that other controls you will figure out by playing the game
